title: What is the contribution of ethology to understanding the dangers of the soul in modern consciousness?
first_phrase: In the earlier part of the text, the author questions the notion of being a "person" in today's world and raises the idea that it is no longer a given fact but rather a task and a problem. The text goes on to discuss the limits of studying magic and shamanism through historical analysis and the challenges that come with it. In the final 200 tokens, the author criticizes De Martino's approach and mentions the limited sources available for the study of magic. The text raises questions about the author's competence in discussing the topic and points out the need for caution and humility while studying supernatural practices.

Cíò non equivale forse ad una esplicita con fessione di incompetenza circa l'argomento che si vorreb be trattare?
